# Needle Treasures Nook

> Cross-stitch patterns inspired by nature. Modern primitive designs handstitched on tea-dyed linen.

## About
Needle Treasures Nook is a cross-stitch pattern shop run by Marieta, a designer with over 30 years of stitching experience. The shop specializes in modern primitive, nature-inspired cross-stitch patterns. All designs are first stitched by hand on linen that Marieta dyes herself using tea, marigolds, and garden flowers.

## Products
- 270+ unique cross-stitch patterns
- Digital PDF downloads (instant delivery)
- Themes: nature, seasons, holidays, folklore, animals
- Style: modern primitive, rustic, folk art

## Free Tools
- **DMC Inventory Tool**: Free web app to track your DMC thread collection, check pattern requirements, find similar colors, and generate shopping lists. Works offline as a PWA.

## Shop Locations
- Etsy: https://needletreasuresnook.etsy.com
- 123Stitch: https://123stitch.com/m/from-Needle-Treasures-Nook
- Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/needletreasuresnook

- 17,000+ sales
- Etsy Star Seller

## Keywords
